title: Thaumaturgy
content:
Thaumaturgy Transmutation Cantrip Gain Advantage on Intimidation and Performance Checks. 10 turns Action

Transmutation Cantrip

Gain Advantage on Intimidation and Performance Checks.

Thaumaturgy is a Transmutation Cantrip in Baldur's Gate 3. It gives the caster a bonus to Intimidation and Performance ability checks.

BG3 Thaumaturgy Information

Description: Gain Advantage on Intimidation and Performance Checks. Level: Cantrip School: Transmutation Casting Time: Action Range: Self Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Thaumaturgy in Baldur's Gate 3

Thaumaturgy can be acquired by the following classes and races: Cleric Zariel Tiefling Path of the Giant (Barbarian subclass)

Cleric Zariel Tiefling Path of the Giant (Barbarian subclass)

Thaumaturgy Tips & Notes in BG3

Differences from D&D 5th Edition: In 5E, thaumaturgy allows the creation of specific magical effects, most of which have no explicit mechanical benefit. However, using it to intimidate other is probably the most common use of the spell.
